title: About
description: The Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, PhRMA, represents the nation's leading biopharmaceutical research companies. We strive to conduct effective advocacy for public policies that encourage the discovery of important, new medicines for patients by biopharmaceutical research companies.
